statement.p: A certain bread recipe asks you to combine yeast and flour with 4 cups of warm 120 째F water. If the water is hotter or colder than that, then the bread won't rise.
All you have available are hot tap water that is 140 째F and refrigerated water that is 40 째F.
How much hot tap water and refrigerated water should you mix together to get 4 cups of 120 째F water?

p.em: Round your answers to 2 decimal places.
